metadata.name: Use of Wfc.exe
metadata.comment: The Workflow Command-line Compiler can be used for AWL bypass and is listed in Microsoft's recommended block rules.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wfc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wfc.exe'))

output.summary: The Workflow Command-line Compiler can be used for AWL bypass and is listed in Microsoft's recommended block rules.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use by a software developer References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Wfc/, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/application-security/application-control/windows-defender-application-control/design/applications-that-can-bypass-wdac
